name: Booty Diver
description: Take a dive into the perilous depths of the ocean as you seek sunken treasure while battling creatures who guard their treasure as you manage your precious air supply.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer 64-bit edition Processor: 2 Ghz Dual-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers. Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
